title: Carcereiros
overview: Carcereiros tells the story and the dilemmas of Adriano, a jailer responsible for controlling all access to the cells of a prison, portraying the penitentiary system under a new look with real testimonials. Integrate and against violence, Adriano uses the word as his greatest weapon. Daily faced with ethical and moral dilemmas, this jailer lives among walls, grids, threats and conflicts.
